name: MBM International
tagline: Make Your Ideas Work // We have a track record of projects with top level international corporations and startups. With our resources we support partners and customers with software development, consulting and research services around the world. We are dedicated to support you to make your ideas work. //
body:
##Software Development
We are experts in developing solutions based on Open Source software and hardware. Our projects range from small to large scale. We manage projects with developers in our offices in Vietnam as well as with our network of developers in India, Latin America and around the world.

##Consulting
With constant tech developments new opportunities and challenges permanently arise. Facilitators become a necessity in established operations - to support positive adaption and implementations of new processes. In a startup resources to set up business process require a strong focus on the core idea. We are the partner to support your growth. Our consultants achieve the goals we set together.

##ICT Research
We conduct market research throughout Asia and EMEA. We develop and implement marketing strategies to grow your business.

***
##The Founders
**Mario Behling** is an entrepreneur who grew up in East-Berlin during the fall of the Berlin wall. He is a Linux expert and the founder of the light Ubuntu distribution, Lubuntu. Mario organized numerous enterprise matchmaking events like FOSS Bridge, deployed WiFi mesh networks in Afghanistan, and started the FOSSASIA community. He supports hardware projects like Crypto Stick, and engages with the Fashion and Tech community in Europe. Mario also build a hotel, set up a tour company in Vietnam and made a film in the Ukraine.

**Hong Phuc Dang** lived several years in the US and Singapore after her childhood in Vietnam. She is widely recognized as an Open Source community and graphics software expert. She has worked on research projects for top International data research companies. Hong Phuc has spoken at numerous International conferences and organized GNOME.Asia and FOSSASIA events.

***
## The Company
MBM International was founded in 2009 by Mario Behling (Germany) and DANG Hong Phuc (Vietnam/Singapore). Since its inception the goal of the company is to lead international corporations and technology startups towards producing higher revenue generating products.

The company builds its operations on the basis of its internationally experienced staff and a proven track record of its founders. We enable our clients to provide better services and products.

* Using latest technologies to solve real world problems
* Leading business services with international consultants in Vietnam, China, Cambodia, Myanmar, and Singapore
* Working efficiently across languages and cultural barriers
* Offering our experience of over 10 years in the regions market of the company's top management from Germany, Japan and Vietnam
* Providing direct access to top regional and national decision makers
* Adhering to highest standards with management best practices, certified SCRUM Masters
* Advancing customers to next level with distributed technologies, git, and tracking systems

### Our Track Record
* Successfully completed projects for world leading companies such as Swiss Post Solutions, Dutch Post, Google, Canonical, Sun Microsystems
* Developed large developer community through our FOSSASIA network
* Finalized important milestones of hardware project Crypto Stick
* Set up commercial WiFi networks with customized OpenWrt distribution in Vietnam and Cambodia
* Mobile Apps on markets and deployed responsive web technologies for customers
* Core contributor to international research reports on region including on ICT in Myanmar and Vietnam
* Conducted research, and trainings over a 5 year period in cooperation with development companies GIZ (German Development cooperation), Australian Aid, Development Aid Sweden, Open Institute Cambodia, Development Innovations and USAID
* Organized large scale developer conferences in Vietnam, Cambodia, and Singapore including GNOME.Asia, FOSSASIA, and Barcamps

***
##Careers
Do you want to work in an international environment? Are you able to actively collaborate with people and organizations in your local environment and across the globe? Do you believe in sharing knowledge with your partners to achieve the highest outcome? Please send us your CV at careers@mbm.vn.

***
##Contact
**MBM International Ltd.** Cong Ty TNHH Thương Mai Dich Vụ Truyen Thong Mat Biec  |  93 Mau Than, p. Xuan Khanh, q. Ninh Kieu, TP. Can Tho  |  Phone: +84 710 3 834 283  |  Fax: +49 3 21 21 21 89 71  |  Email: info@mbm.vn
